name: Krysta Andovic
title: Customer Relations Representative
coverLetter:
To whom it may concern,


I am a young and passionate individual, especially when it comes to the Cannabis industry. I have personally witnessed the incredible impact this plant has had on countless lives and have a strong desire to join such an impactful feild.


I am looking to be a part of this industry in any way possible. Although I am not experienced in working directly with the plants in growth or harvesting, I am certain my skills in gardening and harvesting other crops would be advantageous to have on the team.


I have plenty of experience working in customer relations and sales which I am sure would be suitable to work as a relations or sales representative. I am well spoken, professional and organized.


As a Canadian, I truly believe that the legalisation of cannabis will change the country, economically and morally.


Please contact me for any opportunities in Canada or internationally. I am happy and willing to relocate anywhere as long as I am able to make an impact in some way.


Best Regards,

Krysta Andovic
experience:

additionalInfo: I have an advanced diploma in International Business Administration (2014) from Algonquin College in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.
